headline: Murdoch Adds Fuel to Debate on Australia’s Fires
abstract: Critics see a concerted effort to shift blame, protect conservative leaders and divert attention from climate change.
lead_paragraph: WOMBEYAN CAVES, Australia — Deep in the burning forests south of Sydney this week, volunteer firefighters were clearing a track through the woods, hoping to hold back a nearby blaze, when one of them shouted over the crunching of bulldozers.
